attributes.additional_details:
Its about time the government stepped in to save one of our city's most icons buildings which has been left to irresponsible developers who are only good at going bust.

We need another centre of excellence like the Tate Modern on the west side of town, we could have the 3 Tates on the river.

A centre of culture and media, of enterprise and to show what this country can do with our industrial heritage.

Stop it being an eye sore and waste land, bring life back to Battersea Power Station.
